title: Who is next on The Bride's List?
review: Kill Bill: Vol. 2 Written and Directed by Quentin Tarantino Uma Thurman David Carradine Daryl Hannah Michael MadsenWith two names, O-Ren Ishii (Lucy Liu) and Vernita Green (Vivica A. Fox), crossed off The Bride's (Uma Thurman) list... who is next? 3. Budd (Michael Madsen) Codename: Sidewinder 4. Elle Driver (Daryl Hannah) Codename: California Mountain Snake 5. Bill (David Carradine) Codename: Snake CharmerThe Bride continues her journey of revenge and vengeance. Her mission? To kill Bill. Recap on what happened in Vol. 1. The Bride was pregnant, wanted to get married. DiVAS (Deadly Viper Assassination Squad) tried to kill The Bride (member). The Bride was put in coma and woke up after fours years and seeks revenge. She got revenge on O-Ren Ishii and Vernita Green. Now, The Bride has three others to get revenge on.In Vol. 2, we see some questions about The Bride... be answered. We found out how The Bride got so deadly. Her trainer was Pai Mei. We found out why she wanted to leave the business and have a normal life with a husband and a child. And we finally learn what her name is... *beep* *beep*.Apart from Kill Bill: Vol. 1, Kill Bill: Vol. 2 is one of the best movies ever made. Together, it is absolutely perfect! Everyone in the films give a wonderful performance! Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah, and Michael Madsen give Oscar-worthy performances. Quentin Tarantino deserves a Best Director and a Screenplay Oscar. The film itself should win Best Picture. Both Kill Bill: Vol. 1 and Kill Bill: Vol. 2 are featured in the IMDb's top 250 films of all time. They sure deserve it! ****/**** Two Thumbs Up! A++++ One of the best films EVER! R for violence, language, and brief drug use.

title: Spectacular... and it's only volume 1!
review: Kill Bill: Vol. 1 is a story about revenge and vengeance. Uma Thurman plays *bleep* *bleep* AKA The Bride AKA Black Mamba, a female assassin. A member of the Deadly Viper Assasssination Squad AKA DiVAS. Bill is the leader of the DiVAS. When The Bride gets pregnant, she wants to get married and the leave the business. This cost her the lives of nine people, including her unborn child. After the DiVAS beat the hell out of her, Bill puts a bullet in her head. But, she's still alive. Just in a four year coma. But, when she wakes up... she has some unfinished business with five people!1. O-REN ISHII 2. VERNITA GREEN 3. BUDD 4. ELLE DRIVER 5. BILLThis film, in my point of view, is probably the most violent movie ever. It nearly was rated  NC-17 , do to the violence. But, Quentin put a part of the film in Black and White so it didn't look as violent. Used 450 gallons of fake blood. It features some of the best sword fights in cinema history. Along with one of the best performances in cinema history by Uma Thurman. Quentin Tarantino's masterpiece is perfect from beginning to end. At the end of the film, it includes the best cliffhanger in any movie I've ever seen.All together this film is spectacular... and it's only volume 1!Rated R for strong bloody violence, language, and some sexual content.100/100 10/10 5/5 ****/**** A+++++

movie_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
title: One of the Year's Best!
review: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind Jim Carrey... Joel Barish Kate Winslet... Clementine Kruczynski Kirsten Dunst... Mary Mark Ruffalo... Stan Elijah Wood... Patrick Tom Wilkinson... Dr. Howard MierzwiakEternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind is about a couple, Joel Barish and Cleminatine Kruczynski (Jim Carrey and Kate Winslet) who fall in love. They are together for a while and then they have a fight. Cleminatine goes to Lacuna Inc. to have Joel removed from her mind. When Joel finds out about this, and he decides to have Cleminatine removed from his mind. While in the process of this he remembers all the good times he's had with Cleminatine. Joel realizes he he still loves Cleminatine. You see the journey they will go through to try and make things better before Joel will forget all about Clemenatine!Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind features all the talents from the actors and actresses. Hopefully this film will be celebrated at the Academy Awards coming 2005. Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Kirsten Dunst, and Mark Ruffalo all give Oscar-worthy performances. The film itself is one of the best pictures ever made. It is right up there with Kill Bill: Vol. 2, Garden State, and Closer as one of the best films of the year! With and excellent screenplay and a cast to die for... this film is a hit! 10/10 Two Thumbs Up! ****/**** A+++ R for language and some drug and sexual content.
